nc 

-----Original Message-----
From: The Planet Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Monday, March 21, 2005 11:38 AM
To: area52@bellsouth.net
Cc: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] RE: SR - tiasbuenas]

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

Your email is being sent to our copyright-related legal counsel at the
address copyright@theplanet.com for consideration.

- -------- Original Message --------
Subject: [ABUSE] RE: SR - tiasbuenas
Date: Fri, 18 Mar 2005 18:03:25 -0500
From: Admin <area52@bellsouth.net>
Reply-To: admin@apic-worldwide.com
Organization: APIC-Worldwide
To: <copyright@theplanet.com>, <abuse@theplanet.com>,
<abuse@tiasbuenas.com.ar>
CC: suzerandall@charter.net, Playboy Legal <copyright@playboy.com>





- -----Original Message-----
From: Admin [mailto:area52@bellsouth.net]
Sent: Thursday, March 17, 2005 7:34 AM
To: 'copyright@theplanet.com'; 'abuse@theplanet.com';
'abuse@tiasbuenas.com.ar'
Cc: Playboy Legal (copyright@playboy.com); (suzerandall@charter.net)
Subject: RE: SR - tiasbuenas







- -----Original Message-----
From: Admin [mailto:area52@bellsouth.net]
Sent: Sunday, March 13, 2005 3:01 PM
To: 'copyright@theplanet.com'; 'abuse@theplanet.com';
'abuse@tiasbuenas.com.ar'
Cc: Playboy Legal (copyright@playboy.com); (suzerandall@charter.net)
Subject: SR - tiasbuenas



NOTICE of COPYRIGHT INFRINGEMENT





Haaren Enterprises
26500 West Agoura Rd
PMB 389
Calabasas, Ca 91302









Date:  Mar 13, 2005



To:



Martin Mannucci

Lafinur 2580

Buenos Aires

Ar



ISP:

traceroute to TIASBUENAS.COM.AR (67.19.68.116)

THEPLANET



////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////

Infringing URLs:



http://www.tiasbuenas.com.ar/

ENTIRE WEBSITE IS STOLEN PROPERTY



C Suze Randall  (suze.net)

http://www.tiasbuenas.com.ar/images/P/PATRICIAford01_JPG.jpg

http://www.tiasbuenas.com.ar/images/P/PATRICIAford02_JPG.jpg

http://www.tiasbuenas.com.ar/images/P/PATRICIAford04_JPG.jpg





/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////

FORWARDED (not rep by notice)



PLAYBOY

Too many to list









////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////




Pursuant to the Digital Millennium Copyright Act  and the WIPO (World
Intellectual Property Organization)
(<http://lcweb.loc.gov/copyright/legislation/dmca.pdf>), this letter serves
as actual notice of infringement in the event of legal proceedings.



Steve Easton is a DMCA agent, NOT an attorney. On behalf of the owner of
exclusive right to the  material at issue in this notice, I hereby state
that I have a good faith belief that use of the material in the manner
complained of is not authorized by the  owner, its agent, or the law. I
hereby state, under penalty of perjury under the laws of the United States,
that the information in this notification is accurate, and under penalty of
perjury, that the complaining party is authorized to act on behalf of the
owner of an exclusive right that is being infringed as set out in this
notification.

















////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
///





- --
- --
Thanks,

Policy Enforcement
THe Planet Internet Services, LLC
http://www.theplanet.com/aup/
